page.title: 15MORPETH FIRE STATION
page.content: { {Morpeth Fire Station is beside Loansdean. Mr Hamilton the chief officer met us. In the corridor there is an old {pump fire engines}.There is a large room with seats and a table tennis table for {recreation}.They have tropies for darts,snooker and table-tennis In the Yard they have { {two fire engines},one older than the other.The new one has chimney cleaners ,axes ,knives , metal cutters ,extending-ladders ,flashing-lights and loud sirens .Each engine holds{ {400gallons}ofwater .The {sirens}are to tell cars and pedesrians that there is an emergency.The firemen practise { {drills .}They have a {tower}for this with several floors.Firemen use extinguishers that have cold ice in them for smaller fires ,particularly electrical ones.
